xs:annotation.xs:documentation: HelloWorld method to validate the access to Web Services from every very light HTTP client via Javascript for example
Text to pass to test consumption.
Application context.
Identifier of the database to use in this execution context.
HelloWorld method to validate the access to Web Services from every very light HTTP client via Javascript for example
Returns the text typed upon entry, concatenated with phrase 'Hello You'
Returns the quantity available in stock for an item without dimension or SKU.
[Obsolete] - Item reference - uses the item search priorities
[Added 2013/08 - V1104] [Optional] - Default behavior: This property will replace [itemId] that will become obsolete before being deleted

[Added 2013/11 - V1104] [Optional] - Identifier of the store used. - Default behavior: If the warehouse [warehouseId] is not specified, the warehouse with the highest priority will be used - Related to column [ETABLISS.ET_ETABLISSEMENT]
[Obsolete] [Optional] - Identifier of the warehouse used. - Default behavior: Uses the user's default warehouse - Related to column [DEPOT.GDE_DEPOT]
Item identification criteria: provide either its 'ID' or 'Reference' to find an item respectively via its identifier or reference.
Item identifier. - Related to column [ARTICLE.GA_ARTICLE].
Item reference - uses the item search priorities.
Returns the quantity available in stock for an item without dimension or SKU.
Returns the quantity available in stock. Value 0 is returned if the item identifier or the warehouse identifier are incorrect.
Structure with two pieces of information. The cumulative quantities are in member AvailableQty.

Quantity available in stock for the determined item. - Related to column [DISPO.GQ_RESERVEFOU / DISPO.GQ_ANNONCELIV / DISPO.GQ_ANNONCETRF / DISPO.GQ_PROPOACHAT / DISPO.GQ_PREPACLI / DISPO.GQ_DISPOCLI / DISPO.GQ_RESERVECLI / DISPO.GQ_RESERVETRF / DISPO.GQ_DEMRESERVECLI / DISPO.GQ_PANIERWEB].
Return type.
Possible return codes of the search function for the main warehouse of a store.
Search was running well, warehouse found.
Wrong warehouse code.
Wrong store code.
Store unknown.
Undefined, error without functional explanation.
Returns the cumulative quantities available in stock for all the stores accessible to the current user.
[Obsolete] - Reference to use to determine the item for which the cumulative quantity from all stores must be returned.
[Added 2013/08 - V1104] [Optional] - Default behavior: This property will replace [itemId] that will become obsolete before being deleted
Returns the cumulative quantities available in stock for all the stores accessible to the current user.
Returns an object containing both the cumulative quantity available in stock and the warehouse search status. If no warehouse can be determined, the cumulative quantity will be 0.
Returns the detail by warehouse of the quantity available in stock for an item without dimension or SKU.
[Obsolete] - Reference to use to determine the item for which the detail by store must be returned.
[Added 2013/08 - V1104] [Optional] - Default behavior: This property will replace [itemId] that will become obsolete before being deleted
Returns the detail by warehouse of the quantity available in stock for an item without dimension or SKU.
Returns a list of "store - available quantity" combinations. If no store is open or if the item is unknown, the returned list will be empty.
Object, of type combination, containing an available quantity and the identifier of the store whose main warehouse was select for inventory calculation.

Quantity available in stock for the determined item. If the item reference could not determine the CBR item identifier, the returned quantity is set to 0. - Related to column [DISPO.GQ_RESERVEFOU / DISPO.GQ_ANNONCELIV / DISPO.GQ_ANNONCETRF / DISPO.GQ_PROPOACHAT / DISPO.GQ_PREPACLI / DISPO.GQ_DISPOCLI / DISPO.GQ_RESERVECLI / DISPO.GQ_RESERVETRF / DISPO.GQ_DEMRESERVECLI / DISPO.GQ_PANIERWEB].
Identifier of the store whose main warehouse was used to read the available quantity. - Related to column [ETABLISS.ET_LIBELLE].
Store label. - Related to column [ETABLISS.ET_ETABLISSEMENT].
[Added 2013/08 - V1105] - Enables the differential update of the "Web shopping cart" quantity of an item for a given warehouse.
Structure of the parameters used for update.
Quantity. - Related to column [DISPO.GQ_PANIERWEB].
Warehouse ID. - Related to column [DISPO.GQ_DEPOT].
[Added 2013/08 - V1105] - Enables the differential update of the "Web shopping cart" quantity of an item for a given warehouse.
[Added 2013/08 - V1105] - Resets the "Web shopping cart" quantity of a item for a given warehouse. If no item is specified, the quantity is reset to 0 for all the warehouse.
Structure of parameters used for reset.
[Optional].
Warehouse ID. - Related to column [DISPO.GQ_DEPOT].
[Added 2013/08 - V1105] - Resets the "Web shopping cart" quantity of a item for a given warehouse. If no item is specified, the quantity is reset to 0 for all the warehouse.
[Added 2013/10 - V1104] - Returns the detail of the quantity available in stock for an item list (generic, without dimension, or SKU) and a store list.
[Added 2013/10 - V1104] - Object used to convey data to get the item inventory detail by store
[Added 2013/10 - V1104] [Optional] - With warehouses visible to other stores? Otherwise, only the inventory of the store's main warehouse is visible - Default value: False.
[Added 2013/10 - V1104] [Optional] - If this is a generic item, should the application detail SKUs and their inventory? - Default value: False.
[Added 2013/10 - V1104] - List of items to inventory. The item can be generic (GEN), single (UNI) or dimensioned (DIM).
[Added 2013/10 - V1104] [Optional] - Only data with positive inventory? - Default value: False.
[Added 2013/10 - V1104] [Optional] - Paging object.

[Added 2013/10 - V1104] [Optional] - List of stores which inventory is to be returned. - Default behavior: Otherwise, inventory from all the stores accessible to the current user will be returned. - Related to column [ETABLISS.ET_ETABLISSEMENT].
[Added 2013/10 - V1104] [Optional] - Should we get the name of the store? - Default value: False.
Object for page management. 1st page: PageSize = 50, PageIndex = 1 - 2nd page: PageSize = 50, PageIndex = 2"
[Optional] - Page index to return. 1 by default. - Default value: 1.
[Optional] - Maximum number of lines to return per page. - Default value: 20.
[Added 2013/10 - V1104] - Returns the detail of the quantity available in stock for an item list (generic, without dimension, or SKU) and a store list.
Returns the list of inventory details
Reply of the GetListItemInventoryDetailByStore service
Inventory list by item and store.
For one item: list of the stores and their inventory
Item code.
Inventory list by store.
Quantity in stock for a store
Quantity in stock.
List of SKUs and their quantity in stock.
Store ID.
Store name.
Dimension list of the SKU with quantity in stock
SKU quantity available in stock.
Code of dimension 1.
Code of dimension 2.
Code of dimension 3.
Code of dimension 4.
Code of dimension 5.

wsdl:operation.name: HelloWorld
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: HelloWorld method to validate the access to Web Services from every very light HTTP client via Javascript for example

wsdl:input.wsdl:documentation: Text to pass to test consumption.

wsdl:output.wsdl:documentation: Returns the text typed upon entry, concatenated with phrase 'Hello You'

wsdl:operation.name: GetAvailableQty
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns the quantity available in stock for an item without dimension or SKU.

wsdl:input.wsdl:documentation: [Obsolete] - Item reference - uses the item search priorities

wsdl:output.wsdl:documentation: Returns the quantity available in stock. Value 0 is returned if the item identifier or the warehouse identifier are incorrect.

wsdl:operation.name: GetAvailableCumulativeQtyAllStores
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns the cumulative quantities available in stock for all the stores accessible to the current user.

wsdl:input.wsdl:documentation: [Obsolete] - Reference to use to determine the item for which the cumulative quantity from all stores must be returned.

wsdl:output.wsdl:documentation: Returns an object containing both the cumulative quantity available in stock and the warehouse search status. If no warehouse can be determined, the cumulative quantity will be 0.

wsdl:operation.name: GetInventoryDetailByStore
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns the detail by warehouse of the quantity available in stock for an item without dimension or SKU.

wsdl:input.wsdl:documentation: [Obsolete] - Reference to use to determine the item for which the detail by store must be returned.

wsdl:output.wsdl:documentation: Returns a list of "store - available quantity" combinations. If no store is open or if the item is unknown, the returned list will be empty.

wsdl:operation.name: UpdateShoppingCart
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: [Added 2013/08 - V1105] - Enables the differential update of the "Web shopping cart" quantity of an item for a given warehouse.

wsdl:operation.name: ResetShoppingCart
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: [Added 2013/08 - V1105] - Resets the "Web shopping cart" quantity of a item for a given warehouse. If no item is specified, the quantity is reset to 0 for all the warehouse.

wsdl:operation.name: GetListItemInventoryDetailByStore
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: [Added 2013/10 - V1104] - Returns the detail of the quantity available in stock for an item list (generic, without dimension, or SKU) and a store list.

wsdl:output.wsdl:documentation: Returns the list of inventory details

wsdl:service.name: ItemInventoryWcfService
wsdl:service.wsdl:documentation: [Added V1105] - Web Service contract for querying the item inventory available in a warehouse.
